title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborate with 4 cross-functional teams on a major banking initiative, mentoring 2 interns and ensuring timely feature delivery through Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Build and deploy responsive web portals using Spring MVC and ReactJS, creating dynamic user interfaces that enhance customer engagement and satisfaction.
Develop RESTful APIs with Java 21 and Spring Boot, connecting Hibernate with SQL and MongoDB databases to enable fast, real-time data processing.
Maintain 8 microservice applications using Git and Bitbucket, implementing Apache Kafka for efficient event streaming to improve system reliability and performance.
Configure Tomcat servers and automate deployment processes through Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, reducing release time by 25% across 6 projects.
Test and validate over 30 APIs using Postman and strengthen code quality with JUnit automated testing, improving bug detection efficiency by 95%.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed full-stack web applications that automated student request workflows for UMKC departments, reducing manual processing time by 30%.
Built reusable React and Node.js components with SQL database integration, improving data accuracy by 25% and enhancing system reliability.
Implemented CI/CD automation and Docker containerization, reducing deployment time from hours to minutes and streamlining the release process.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design analytics dashboards that provided real-time performance insights, increasing data-driven decision-making by 40%.

title: Software Engineer
description: Delivered 15+ scalable warehouse management web pages using ReactJS and Spring Boot, accelerating development cycles by 30% through Agile practices and Jenkins automation.
Migrated 35+ legacy AngularJS components to Vue.js, improving page load times by 40% and reducing maintenance costs by 25% for a smoother user experience.
Developed reusable UI components with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap to maintain design consistency and reduce feature delivery timelines by 2 weeks on average.
Created RESTful APIs for inventory and stock management systems, improving response times by 35% and ensuring accurate real-time data for warehouse operations.
Enhanced CI/CD pipelines by integrating automated testing and code analysis tools, increasing deployment reliability and reducing production rollback incidents.

title: Software Developer
description: Developed dynamic web applications using AngularJS and Spring Boot, improving application load times by 25% through performance optimization and debugging.
Built reusable UI components with AngularJS and Bootstrap, ensuring design consistency across projects and reducing front-end development time by 30%.
Worked with senior engineers to integrate RESTful APIs and implement Jenkins CI/CD pipelines with Docker, improving deployment reliability by 40%.
Participated in Agile sprints and code reviews, contributing to a collaborative team environment and increasing software delivery speed by 20% through continuous improvement.
